ing: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of chicken soup
des: "This is a delicious macaroni and cheese dish with chicken. Serve with a green salad."
ins:
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add macaroni and cook for 8 minutes or until al dente; drain.
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
In a large bowl combine cooked macaroni, chicken, cheddar cheese, soup, milk and mushrooms. Place mixture in a 9x13 inch baking dish.
Bake uncovered in preheated oven for 50 to 60 minutes; serve.
